thread.title: Peoria Super Hero 5K will bring costumed runners to Riverfront on Saturday
thread.title_full: Peoria Super Hero 5K will bring costumed runners to Riverfront on Saturday

author: Thomas Bruch
title: Peoria Super Hero 5K will bring costumed runners to Riverfront on Saturday
text: Peoria Super Hero 5K will bring costumed runners to Riverfront on Saturday Comment Follow @@thomasbruch Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 5:58 PM PEORIA — During Halloween season, any excuse to dress up in a costume is worthwhile — including a 5K race. The Peoria Superhero and Kid's Villain Chase will be held on the Peoria Riverfront on Saturday with all proceeds going to United Way. All participants, kids and adults, are asked to dress up in their favorite superhero costume for the race. Registration begins at 10 a.m. Saturday at the Gateway Building. The costume judging contest commences at noon, with the 5K promptly starting at 1 p.m. The Kid's Villain Chase, for children 10 years old and younger, follows one hour later. The event is sponsored by Advanced Technology Services. Race registration costs $30 for adults and $20 for children. For more information, visit the race's website at www.peoriasuperhero.com .
